About

tur-uhs - journey, expedition, pilgrimage

To put it simply, Turas Tech is the result of my passion for learning. I like knowing how things work. Almost everything runs on code. So I decided to learn how to code. And now I code for a living! Of course, 'everything' is a pretty big word. To be more specific: I primarily code applications for iPhones and websites; I love 2D animation (like this for example!), and lots of other software things. I've tried my hand at a number of languages, and I'm always learning more. So if you're looking for a developer, feel free to contact me! Even if it's about something that I didn't mention, worst case scenario, I don't know how to do what you need and I'm excited to learn, or I can give you some direction or know someone who can help you out. If you want to know more about Turas Tech, I'd recommend checking out my blog for a more detailed story of how this all got started. If you're looking to have an app or website built, let's talk! I'd be glad to just chat about software, or get you a quote or some direction on a project.
